nodes.bodyText: this is effectively the same as reverting MULE-15508

The reason because I changed this behaviour was that if we call validateLicense() from MuleContainer::start, when MuleContainer is instanced, artifactResourcesRegistry instance variable will be built, which indirectly calls MuleEmbeddedLicenseCheck.checkLicense(); because of the aspect defined in LicenseCheckAspect.aj.
In short, the validation will happen earlier in another place, and the error message will be a RuntimeException.
We could defer the validateLicense() invocation until the MuleContainer constructor, but it still will block the start of the runtime until the validation finishes.  What do you think?
